items.sentence: This is considered to be a matter of great importance.
Tom said he wasn\'t used to this kind of cold weather.
Mr. Jackson is the most popular teacher at our school.
His idea is too abstract to be of practical use to us.
I bet this is the first time this has happened to you.
We\'ve been having strange weather the past few years.
Weather permitting, we\'ll start on our trip tomorrow.
I don\'t know how to say what I want to say in French.
We\'re going to take another trip together next month.
Weren\'t you the one who recommended that we hire Tom?
